item.title: Game to relax during the corona virus pandemic
item.description: Does the thought of going out scare you with all the pandemic news? What if you could have fun in some of the time that you are worried about COVID-19? Play this simple game I made using p5js. Your goal is to go out and collect virtual groceries whilst avoiding infected people!
